meanings.definition: A type of boat used in the Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: The schuits sailed gracefully on the calm canal waters.
meanings.sent2: Many schuits were docked along the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The schuits decided to have a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The colorful schuits resembled floating houses.
meanings.sent5: Children waved excitedly at the passing schuits.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of schuits on the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various schuits from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The schuits gathered for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with schuits as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed from the cheerful schuits.
